titleStmt.title: Certain material and useful considerations about the laws positive and laws of necessity relating to the unhappy distractions of the present times
titleStmt.author: Mathew, John.
Philalethes.

notesStmt.note: Wing attributes work to John Mathew, which name is written on t.p. in manuscript.
Title has been changed by ms. note to read: ... relating to the unhappy distractions of [ye] the[n] present times [1643/4]
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
